title: Ambiguity of Twisted Treeline (3v3)
body:
This is an issue specifically with OCE, but there is a lot of ambiguity with 3v3 as to whether it's ranked or normal. 

On EUWE, you have the option to choose either & you can clearly see the two, but on OCE it's time-based, which is fine, but the issue is you don't know the gamemode until you create your lobby. 
Which is problematic, because you have people trying to play Ranked & have people joining to "try it out" & "just for fun" because they didn't notice it was ranked.
Even my friends of whom I invited to play didn't realise it was ranked. 

If when selecting the gamemode, there was a visible specification of whether it was normal or ranked, it would be very useful.

I am sure this isn't an issue at higher elo, but at lower elo it is very apparent.

replies.body: This. Would also love to know the exact schedule for Twisted Treeline queues or where I can find it.

The exact schedule for queues on OCE can be found in the [Queue Schedule thread](https://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/announcements/wgM0WBsO-queue-schedule-updated-oct-23rd) (pinned on the boards, so should be at the top). For Twisted Treeline specifically, Normal blind is stated to run on Tuesday-Wednesday from 3:00pm-1:00am AEDT and Ranked Flex is stated to run on Thursday-Friday 5:00pm - 0:00am AEDT (though the queue schedule thread currently states "regular schedule not in effect" for ranked).

Honestly, it would be good if it was just stated normally like with the options for Summoner's Rift, but for some reason that just doesn't happen.
